title: Crew Show! (Harleys, Mustangs, Mach-E, Q&A!)
description:
We’re catching up on what we’ve driven lately: Mustang Mach 1, McLaren 720S, Hellcat Redeye, Mach E, suspension, new parts, and answering your questions!

 

Listeners of The Smoking Tire Podcast receive 30% off Keeper Unlimited and Family plans. Use promo code SMOKINGTIRE30 at checkout or visit keeper.io/smokingtire to learn more.

 

First 100 listeners who go to Sennheiser.com/Podcast and use promo code TIRE will receive 15% off the Momentum True Wireless 2 earbuds or any of their amazing headphones.

 

Go to AutoTempest.com/TST so they know we sent you.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (david patterson, that dude in blue)
